Package jspecview.util

Class Summary
Coordinate The Coordinate class stores the x and y values of a coordinate.
DisplayScheme This a representation of the Display Scheme the spectral display.
DisplaySchemesProcessor DisplaySchemesProcessor loads and saves the display schemes of Jspecview.
JDXCompressor JDXCompressor takes an array of Coordinates and compresses them into one of the JCAMP-DX compression formats: DIF, FIX, PAC and SQZ.
JDXDecompressor JDXDecompressor contains static methods to decompress the data part of a JCAMP-DX spectra that have been compressed using DIF, FIX, SQZ or PAC formats.
JDXExporter class JDXExporter contains static methods for exporting a JCAMP-DX Spectrum in one of the compression formats DIF, FIX, PAC, SQZ or as x, y values.
JDXSourceStringTokenizer JDXSourceStringTokenizer breaks up the JDXSource into pairs of Label Data Records (LDRs).
JDXTokenizer An alternate implementation of a tokenizer for a JDXSource.
JSpecViewUtils JSpecViewUtils contains static methods used to calculate values for display of spectra and other utility methods used in the application.
JSpecViewUtils.MultiScaleData The inner class of JSpecViewUtils that stores information about scale and range that JSVPanel needs to to display a graph with a mutliple plots.
JSpecViewUtils.ScaleData The inner class of JSpecViewUtils that stores information about scale and range that JSVPanel needs to to display a graph with a single plot.
TransmittanceAbsorbanceConverter class TransmittanceAbsorbanceConverter converts a JDXSpectrum from Transmittance to Absorbance and vice versa.
